tool.name: MACS2 filterdup
tool.description: Remove duplicate reads at the same position
tool.command: @home_dir@ macs2 filterdup -i '${ infile }' -o '${ outfile }' --format '${ infile.extension.upper() }' @effective_genome_size@ @tag_size@ --pvalue '${ pvalue }' #if str( $keep_dup_options.keep_dup_options_selector ) == "user": --keep-dup '${ keep_dup_options.user_keepdup }' #else --keep-dup '${ keep_dup_options.keep_dup_options_selector }' #end if

param.name: pvalue
param.label: Pvalue cutoff for binomial distribution test

tool.help:
**What it does**
This is **filterdup** utility from the MACS2_ Package. It removes duplicate reads and converts results to BED format.
.. _MACS2: https://github.com/taoliu/MACS
@citation@
